content.raw: When running the `fixed_simple_36.world` I see the robots rolling as expected. When rolling, the additional `yawRate` component that we add to make the robot turn, also makes the robot to go down (and fall below the ground plane). Is this expected?
content.html: When running the fixed_simple_36.world I see the robots rolling as expected. When rolling, the additional yawRate component that we add to make the robot turn, also makes the robot to go down (and fall below the ground plane). Is this expected?
